summary: REQ-6 and REQ-7 appear implemented via a clickable A–Z grid and state-based navigation to a generic LetterWordsPage with a dynamic header subtitle and a “Back to Alphabet” button. REQ-8 is partially evidenced by adding a unified letterWords dataset importing existing A words, but the diff is truncated so completeness for all letters A–Z cannot be confirmed.

missing_requirements.requirement: Add static, curated word lists for each letter B–Z and ensure the words page renders the correct list based on the selected letter (A–Z).
missing_requirements.reason: The new unified dataset file is truncated, so it’s not verifiable from the provided diff summary that curated lists exist for every letter through Z (and thus that selecting any letter, e.g. X/Z, will display its corresponding list).

hallucinated_features.description: Added/changed a footer with a 2026 copyright notice and an external link to caffeine.ai, including icons.
hallucinated_features.reason: The BuildRequest focuses on making all letters navigable and adding static word lists; it does not request new branding/footer content or external promotional links.
